  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public User createUser(String nickname) throws ExistingNicknameException, EmptyNicknameException, RemoteException
      Method that check if the nickname is already used, check if the nickname is used by a client that disconnected and create a new user if neither of the previous check is true
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the username of the user wrote by the client
      Returns:
      the initialized user
      Throws:
      ExistingNicknameException - if the nickname is already used
      EmptyNicknameException - if the nickname is empty
      RemoteException - if there is a problem in RMI

    • createGame

      public GameController createGame(String username, int playerNumber) throws WrongPlayerException
      Method used to create a new game with a game controller and a virtual view
      Parameters:
      username - is the nickname of the user who wants to create a game
      playerNumber - is the number of player that have to join to start the game
      Returns:
      the game controller of the game
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException - if the user write a player number which is less than 2 or more than 4.

    • joinGame

      public GameController joinGame(String username, int gameID) throws InvalidIDException, WrongPlayerException, IllegalValueException, IOException
      Method used to join an already created game using the game ID
      Parameters:
      username - is the nickname of the user that wants to join a game
      gameID - is the unique identifier of an already created game
      Returns:
      the game controller of the game
      Throws:
      InvalidIDException - if the client write a game ID that not exist
      WrongPlayerException - if there is too much player in the game
      IllegalValueException - if the client write a game ID that not exist
      RemoteException - if there is some problem with RMI
      IOException

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController(int gameID) throws InvalidIDException
      Getter method that given the
      Parameters:
      gameID - id of a game
      Returns:
      the instance of the game-controller that contains that gameID
      Throws:
      InvalidIDException - if the given gameID is invalid

    • notifyEndGame

      public void notifyEndGame(int gameID) throws InvalidIDException
      Method used to notify that the game is finished and destroy the game and the respective game controller
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the unique identifier of an already created game
      Throws:
      InvalidIDException - if the give game ID is not existing

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • disconnect_user

      public void disconnect_user(String username)
      Given a
      Parameters:
      username - string, finds the User instance of that player, then disconnects him from the game.
